business.headline: Japan's Nikkei leads Asia's recovery as US mulls softer tariff approachA 5.6% rebound in Japan's Nikkei far outpaced other regional markets, with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Trade Representative Jamieson Greer tasked with leading trade negotiations with Tokyo.

Explained: Why Titan share price jumped 7% after hitting 52-week lowThe recovery in Titan share price came just a day after the stock touched its 52-week low of Rs 2,947.55. In the morning session, Titan shares climbed to a high of Rs 3,222, providing some relief to investors after a tough few months.

Sensex, Nifty in green: Why is stock market rising today? 3 things to knowSensex, Nifty today: Tracking global markets that showed signs of recovery, Sensex and Nifty surged more than 1.5% in early trade, shaking off fears that had weighed heavily just a day earlier, with early buying seen across most sectors.
Sensex, Nifty gain as global markets recover from Trump's tariff shockThe S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,217.78 points to 74,355.68, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 380.50 points to 22,542.10 as of 9:35 am.
Global markets show signs of recovery. Will Sensex and Nifty gain today?A slight improvement in global markets, especially in the US and Asia, has brought some hope after the recent sell-off.

Stocks to watch on April 8: M&M, BEL, Adani Ports, Tata Motors, TitanInvestors are likely to keep a close eye on Tuesday's market, looking for signs of a rebound. Asian markets opened higher, offering some relief after a choppy session in the US.

Wall Street's fear gauge spikes, stocks sink as Trump stands firm on tariffsWall Street equities have been hammered since US President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, announced on April 2, on all imports into the US and much higher levies on some major trading partners.

How market reacted briefly to Donald Trump tariff pause rumourA misinterpreted comment about Trump pausing tariffs briefly sent markets soaring before crashing. Social media spread the false claim, prompting a quick White House denial that ended the short-lived rally.

Wall Street slides again on tariff fears; will Sensex, Nifty follow suit?Wall Street remained weak on Monday, with all three major indexes falling for a third straight session. The drop came after US President Donald Trump announced a new round of heavy tariffs on imports, which led to retaliation from major trade partners, including China.

S&P 500 rebounds after early trade fall in volatile US market sessionThe S&P 500 has dropped 20% from its peak closing level reached in February. If it finishes at this level or lower, it would officially mark the start of a bear market from February onward.

LPG cylinder prices hiked by Rs 50 for both subsidised, non-subsidised consumersThe government has hiked LPG prices to recover past losses, pushing up household cooking costs at a time of rising economic uncertainty and global trade tensions.

After Trump, EU wants India to remove tariffs on car imports: ReportThe European Union is pressing India to eliminate steep import tariffs on automobiles under a long-delayed trade deal , with India signalling a willingness to offer more attractive terms.

Sensex closes 2,200 points lower as Dalal Street logs worst session in 10 monthsStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 2226.79 points lower at 73,137.90, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 742.85 points to trade at settle at 22,161.60. Most of the broader market indices also crashed during the extremely volatile trading session.

Excise duty on petrol, diesel increased by Rs 2; no impact on consumersThe move comes at a time when global crude oil prices are actually on a downward trend, driven by fears of a global trade war sparked by the US administration's reciprocal tariffs.

Apple flies iphones from India and China to dodge Trump's tariffs: ReportApple is closely studying how different tariff rules in various countries could impact its supply chain. The US remains one of Apple's key markets, and the company is trying to avoid passing on higher costs to customers.

$10 billion wiped out: India's richest 4 take a hit in stock market crashThe country's top four billionaires, Mukesh Ambani, Gautam Adani, Savitri Jindal & family, and Shiv Nadar, together lost over $10 billion as markets around the world fell sharply.

What is 'Black Monday' stock market crash? Know why it's making headlines againOn Friday, April 4, 2025, the US stock market had its worst day since the Covid-19 crash. More than $5 trillion was erased in a matter of hours as stocks plummeted, and volatility soared.

Stock market crash: What should investors do as Trump tariffs batter portfolios?Dalal Street is bleeding as global turmoil deepens amid Trump's tariff shock. Read on to find out what investors should do now amid the chaos and confusion.

India's worst stock market crashes: From Covid-19 to Trump tariffsOn Monday, April 7, the Indian stock market faced one of its biggest falls since June 2024. The Sensex fell nearly 4,000 points, while the Nifty 50 slipped below 21,750, dragging down investor confidence.

Stock market crash: Which sectors have been hit hardest today?All sectors ended deep in the red, triggering sharp wealth erosion for investors. Some bore steeper losses than others. Here's a breakdown of the hardest-hit sectors in today's session.

Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 10% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors' stock has seen a steady decline over the past few months. It has fallen by 17.12% in the last five trading days alone. In the past six months, the stock is down by 39.42%. Over the last one year, it has lost 44.50% of its value.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 reasons behind stock market crashShare market crash: Dalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

Rs 19 lakh crore wealth wiped out on Dalal Street; no stock trades in greenThe sharp fall in the stock market followed a global selloff triggered by rising trade tensions and growing fears of a recession in the United States. Markets around the world have come under pressure, and Indian stocks were no exception.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

Sensex falls to 10-month low, Rs 19 lakh crore wiped out amid Trump tariff shockShare market crash: With today's stock market plunge, the Sensex and Nifty have fallen to their lowest levels in approximately 10 months, and analysts suggest that they could fall further due to massive volatility in global markets.

Stocks to watch on April 7: Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd BankShares of firms such as Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd Bank, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, TVS, Bajaj Housing Finance, YES Bank etc. will be in focus today due to important developments.

Asian markets plunge as Trump tariffs spark global sell-off; Nikkei dives nearly 8%Asian markets tumbled sharply following Wall Street's crash, triggered by Trump's tariff escalation and Beijing's retaliation. Japan's Nikkei led the losses, diving nearly 8%, as recession fears gripped investors.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

'Black Monday': US expert warns Trump tariffs could trigger worst crash since 1987Jim Cramer warned that markets might face a bloodbath similar to 1987 - when the Dow Jones suffered its biggest single-day crash to date. He claimed that if the US President didn't 'reach out' to nations which have not imposed retaliatory tariffs and reward them for their compliance, the situation could worsen.

Piyush Goyal announces helpline for startups days after 'dukandari' jibe at themDays after questioning the innovation of Indian startups overtly focussing on food delivery and betting and fantasy sports apps, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal announced a helpline for startups if they wanted to make suggestions or file complaints.

How China-US trade war unfolded: A timeline of tariffs and countermovesChina is responding forcefully to Trump's latest tariffs with a 34% tax on US imports, rare earth export curbs, company bans, and WTO action, raising fears of another full-blown trade war.

Jaguar Land Rover to suspend shipments to US over tariffs on BritainJaguar Land Rover, which is owned by India's Tata Motors, confirmed the temporary export suspension after the Times newspaper reported the plan.

JP Morgan warns of 60% chance of global recession after Trump's tariffsFollowing the US-China trade war, global investment firm J.P. Morgan said it now sees a 60% chance of the global economy entering recession by year-end, up from 40% previously.

Wall Street shatters as Trump tariffs trigger worst day in US markets since 2020US markets suffered their steepest decline since 2020 after China retaliated against Trump's tariffs. The S&P 500 fell 6%, fuelling recession fears and intensifying investor anxiety across global markets.

Dow crashes 2,000 points as Trump's tariffs spark global market panicGlobal markets plunged as Trump's tariffs triggered a trade war escalation with China. The Dow fell over 2,000 points, crude prices tumbled, and investors feared an impending global recession.

Higher inflation, slower growth: US Federal Reserve chair warns after Trump tariffsUS Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell spoke as global markets continued a swoon that has wiped some 10 per cent off major US stock indexes since Trump announced a raft of new tariffs on Wednesday.

US stocks plummet after China's retaliatory levies in response to Trump tariffsNasdaq IXIC dropped more than 20 per cent from its all-time closing high touched in December, putting it on course to confirm a bear market.
Income tax return 2025: ITR-2 filing now made easierITR-2 is meant for individuals whose annual income is above Rs 50 lakh or who earn from sources like rent, capital gains, or other sources.

Sensex tumbles over 900 points, Nifty ends below 23,000; IT, metal stocks crashThe S&P BSE Sensex tumbled 930.67 points to 75,364.69 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 tumbled 345.65 points to settle at 22,904.45.

IT stocks bleed as market crashes. Why TCS, Infosys, Wipro shares are down?All major IT stocks declined as fears of a US recession led to heavy selling. IT companies earn a large portion of their revenue from the US market, and concerns about a slowdown in technology spending have further weakened investor sentiment.

entertainment.headline: Sunny Deol doesn't want Jaat to be called a religious film. Here's whyActor Sunny Deol recently attended a press event in the capital where he opened up about his upcoming release, Jaat, and said that he doesn't want it to be labelled as some kind of 'religious film.'

Wildfire unleashed: Allu Arjun's journey to global stardom, upwards and onwards!Pushpa or not, Allu Arjun is the mass star who's here to stay. Here's looking at the Icon Star's flourishing career that transcends boundaries.

Allu Arjun, Atlee team up for 'spectacular' sci-fi actioner, watch special announcementIt's official! Allu Arjun is teaming up with renowned filmmaker Atlee for his 22nd film. The special announcement was made on the actor's 43rd birthday on April 8.

Pride of India: PM Modi's letter to Manoj Kumar's wife salutes his rich legacyPrime Minister Narendra Modi mourned the loss of Bollywood veteran Manoj Kumar. He shared a heartwarming note on Tuesday, recollecting his meeting with the legend, and offering condolences to his family.

Want my time back: Vishal Dadlani on Indian Idol exit after judging 6 seasonsMusic composer and singer Vishal Dadlani announced in an Instagram post that he will not return to judge 'Indian Idol' after wrapping up season 6. He thanked his fellow judges - Shreya Ghoshal and Badshah - and wrote about wanting to get his 'time back'.

Gehraiyaan actor Dhairya Karwa gets married in Jaipur. Pic goes viralActor Dhairya Karwa, who shared screen space with Deepika Padukone in Gehraiyaan, recently got married in a private ceremony in Jaipur. A photo of the couple from the wedding is now going viral on social media.

Iron Man star Terrence Howard claims Diddy 'tried to have sex' with himAmerican actor Terrence Howard accused music mogul Sean 'Diddy' Combs of making unwanted sexual advances. The allegations have sparked widespread media attention and debate.

Sikandar box office Day 9: Salman Khan's film crashes on 2nd MondaySalman Khan's 'Sikandar' registered an abysmal second Monday at the box office. The film didn't do anything extraordinary during the weekend either, and Monday further took its trajectory downward at the ticket window.

TV actor Karan Patel on OTT becoming 'soft porn', getting no work for 6 years'Yeh Hai Mohabbatein' and 'Kasturi' star Karan Patel spoke to Bharti Singh on her podcast and revealed that he has not been offered any TV show for the last six years. He also commented on the OTT scene, and why he thinks it has become a 'sleaze'.

Empuraan beats Manjummel Boys to become highest-grossing Malayalam filmDirector Prithviraj Sukumaran's 'L2: Empuraan', starring Mohanlal is the highest-grossing Malayalam film. The film surpassed 'Manjummel Boys' by earning over Rs 250 crore worldwide.

Allu Arjun rings in 43rd birthday with wife Sneha, children. See picIt's Tollywood superstar Allu Arjun's day! The Pushpa star celebrated his 43rd birthday with his wife, Allu Sneha Reddy, and children. Sneha shared a picture from their intimate and cosy bash.

Pics: Suhana Khan, Agastya Nanda step out for dinner with friends in MumbaiSuhana Khan and Agastya Nanda, who are rumoured to be dating, were seen dining at a Mumbai restaurant on Monday. They were seen with their friends.

Court: Actor Nani-backed courtroom drama to premiere on Netflix this AprilThe courtroom drama Court-State vs a Nobody is set to stream on Netflix from April 11. The film directed by Ram Jagadeesh, is backed by actor Nani.

How much does Nick Jonas earn? A peek into his lavish lifestyleNick Jonas, with a joint net worth of $80 million alongside wife Priyanka Chopra, built his fortune through music, acting, business ventures like Villa One tequila, real estate, and brand endorsements.

Ed Sheeran teams up with Arijit Singh for new album? Here's what we knowSingers Ed Sheeran and Arijit Singh's upcoming album collaboration has fans buzzing with excitement. The British singer confirmed the same during a recent podcast interview.

Bollywood has to own its mess and clean it: Nushratt BharucchaActor Nushrratt Bharuccha, in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital, opened up about the post-pandemic struggles of Hindi cinema.

Jr NTR shares warm moment with Sukumar, fans hope for reunion. See pic A heartwarming photo of Jr NTR and Sukumar, shared by the director's wife Tabitha, has sent fans into a frenzy, sparking renewed speculation of a potential collaboration.

Did John Abraham bring his own pasta? Arjun Kapoor's comment leaves fans in splitsJohn Abraham's recent picture with his wife, Priya Runchal, and friends at a restaurant has emerged online. Arjun Kapoor's reaction to the photo has left fans in splits.

Mission Impossible Final Reckoning trailer: Tom Cruise is ready to risk it allMission Impossible 8 trailer: Tom Cruise's Ethan Hunt takes on AI in the final film of the franchise. Helmed by Christopher McQuarrie, it is set to release in May 2025.

general news.headline: Cannot sit on bills: Top court raps Tamil Nadu Governor, clears 10 pending billsIn a landmark ruling, the Supreme Court declared that Governors cannot indefinitely delay action on bills, calling such inaction unconstitutional and illegal.

Supreme Court cancels CBI probe into additional teacher posts in BengalIn a huge relief to the Mamata Banerjee government, the Supreme Court decided to overturn the Calcutta High Court's decision to order a CBI probe into the creation of additional posts for Staff Selection Commission (SSC) recruitment in 2022.

Chaos in Jammu and Kashmir Assembly over Waqf Act, PDP leader marshalled outThe Jammu and Kashmir Assembly saw uproar as opposition parties clashed over the Waqf Amendment Act, prompting adjournment, slogan-shouting, and demands for the Speaker's removal.

Rajat Patidar 4th captain to be fined for slow over rate in IPL 2025Royal Challengers Bengaluru captain Rajat Patidar has been fined Rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate against Mumbai Indians. Rajat is the 4th captain to get fined this season.

Is your vitamin D low? Your gut might be paying the priceThat post-lunch bloat, those unpredictable bathroom visits, and even chronic conditions like IBS or IBD could be tied to that sunshine vitamin you've been neglecting.

Sensex, Nifty in green: Why is stock market rising today? 3 things to knowSensex, Nifty today: Tracking global markets that showed signs of recovery, Sensex and Nifty surged more than 1.5% in early trade, shaking off fears that had weighed heavily just a day earlier, with early buying seen across most sectors.

China unfazed by Trump's 50% tariff threat, vows to fight to the endTrump threatened China with an additional 50 per cent tariff amid escalating trade tensions, prompting strong retaliatory measures from Beijing, including rare-earth export controls.

JEE candidates miss exam due to Deputy Chief Minister's convoy, probe orderedOver 20 JEE aspirants in Visakhapatnam allegedly missed their exam due to traffic delays reportedly caused by Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan's convoy. However, the police denied the allegation, but Kalyan's office ordered an inquiry into the incident.

No country left off: Top US official justifies Trump tariffs on penguin islandsUS Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick defended the 10 per cent tariffs on the uninhabited Heard and McDonald Islands, arguing it was a deliberate effort to close "ridiculous loopholes" that allowed countries to evade tariffs.

Twisted my words: Karnataka Minister clarifies 'molestation here and there' remarkKarnataka Home Minister G Parameshwara clarified his remarks on the Bengaluru sexual assault case, saying his statement was twisted. He expressed regret if women were hurt and reiterated his commitment to women's safety.

Elon Musk privately asked Trump to back down on China tariffs: ReportElon Musk took his fight against tariffs straight to Trump, hoping to change his mind. While clashing publicly with advisers, Musk quietly made his case behind the scenes—so far, without success.

Microsoft fires Indian-origin techie, another for protest during 50th anniversaryVaniya Agrawal was already serving a two-week notice period before she was asked to leave immediately. Along with her, another software engineer, Ibtihal Aboussad, was also fired for protesting against the company's alleged role in providing technological support to Israel in its military campaign in Gaza.

Watch: Dire wolves howl again after more than 10,000 yearsColossal Biosciences has created three wolf pups that look like dire wolves, extinct for over 10,000 years. Using ancient DNA and CRISPR tech, scientists revived their appearance—but not their instincts.

Pride of India: PM Modi's letter to Manoj Kumar's wife salutes his rich legacyPrime Minister Narendra Modi mourned the loss of Bollywood veteran Manoj Kumar. He shared a heartwarming note on Tuesday, recollecting his meeting with the legend, and offering condolences to his family.

Andhra Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan's son hurt in Singapore fire accidentAndhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan's son was injured in a fire accident at his Singapore school. Kalyan has cancelled all his engagements to go to Singapore.

Girl, 6, raped and murdered by uncle; he hid her body in neighbour's car trunkA six-year-old girl was raped and murdered allegedly by her 24-year-old uncle in Chhattisgarh's Durg. The accused, who was arrested after questioning, hid the body in the trunk of a neighbour's car, police said.
From WagonR to Ertiga and Fronx, Maruti cars to get costlier by up to Rs 62,000This is the second price hike being taken by Maruti this year, following a 4% hike in January 2025.

Caught on CCTV: Drunk driver runs over 3 on Jaipur street as people run in panicEyewitnesses claimed that several pedestrians narrowly escaped, screaming in panic as the car swerved wildly. The accused, Usman, struck a motorcycle, a scooter, and a total of three vehicles in a row, causing mayhem in a narrow, over-crowded lane in Nahargarh.

Video: Blast outside BJP leader's Punjab house as man on e-rickshaw lobs grenadeIn the CCTV footage accessed by the police, an individual is seen arriving hurling an unidentified object from a e-rickshaw and subsequently fleeing from the scene in the same vehicle.

AI is replacing jobs: Shopify CEO says no new hires unless AI can't do it betterShopify CEO Tobi Lütke says employees must show why AI cannot complete a task before requesting additional headcount or resources.

Tahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapse renews call for regular screeningsTahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapsed, she shared on Instagram, highlighting the importance of regular screening. "Get your regular mammograms," she wrote.

Will Pucovski retires at 27 after multiple concussions: Star's tragic storyOnce touted as the Australian batting prodigy, Will Pucovski has retired from all forms of cricket after a prolonged battle with concussion injuries. In an emotional interview, the 27-year-old has explained the daily struggles he faces due to concussion injuries.

Severe heatwave scorches North India, alert issued in Delhi for 2 daysNorth India reeled under its first major heatwave of the season, with temperatures soaring 5 degrees Celsius to 8 degrees Celsius above normal in several states, including Delhi, Rajasthan and Gujarat.

Indian man in Austria lists 'benefits' of European lifestyle. Video divides InternetAn Indian-origin man living in Austria listed several 'benefits' of a European lifestyle while comparing it to the one he had back home.

sports.headline: Rajat Patidar 4th captain to be fined for slow over rate in IPL 2025Royal Challengers Bengaluru captain Rajat Patidar has been fined Rs 12 lakh for maintaining a slow over-rate against Mumbai Indians. Rajat is the 4th captain to get fined this season.

Rishabh Pant recalls Ashish Nehra's invaluable advice during tough timesLSG captain Rishabh Pant recalled Ashish Nehra's invaluable advice ahead of the team's match against KKR. Pant said that Nehra's advice helped him through tough times when he was struggling physically and mentally.

Rishabh Pant joins Sanjiv Goenka in Kolkata to cheer for Mohun Bagan SG in ISL semisIPL 2025: Ahead of Lucknow Super Giants' away game in Kolkata, captain Rishabh Pant and owner Sanjiv Goenka were seen cheering for Mohun Bagan SG during their semi-final second-leg win over Jamshedpur FC in Kolkata on Monday.

Chahal's advice for next-gen IPL spinners: Make yourself mentally toughYuzvendra Chahal, the leading wicket-taker in the IPL, has said that new-age spinners need to be mentally tough to survive in the tournament. He has advised youngsters to learn how to handle pressure.

Powerplay with both bat and ball a big concern for MI: Coach JayawardeneMumbai Indians head coca Mahela Jayawardene has said that his team is lacking in the powerplay with both bat and ball. After their loss against RCB, MI are at the 8th position in the IPL points table.

KKR vs LSG Live Score: Kolkata host Lucknow in a mid-table clashKolkata Knight Riders (KKR) vs Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) Live Score IPL 2025: Kolkata Knight Riders will host Lucknow Super Giants in a mid-table group clash in the Indian Premier League on Tuesday at the Eden Gardens in Kolkata. Check out this space of all updates related to IPL.

Bhuvneshwar Kumar goes past Bravo, becomes most successful pacer in IPL historyRCB fast bowler Bhuvneshwar Kumar scripted history with the wicket of Tilak Varma on Monday. With the wicket, Bhuvneshwar overtook Dwayne Bravo as the fast bowler with most wickets in the history of the IPL.

Devdutt Padikkal credits captain Rajat Patidar for RCB's brilliant startRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Devdutt Padikkal has credited captain Rajat Patidar for his side's impressive start in the ongoing IPL 2025 after the 12-run win over MI.

Watch: Apuia's last-gasp worldie take Mohun Bagan to ISL FinalLalengmawia 'Apuia' Ralte scored a world-class last-gasp goal helped Mohun Bagan qualify for the final of the Indian Super League on Monday, April 7. Apuia's goal left the Kolkata crowd stunned.

Rajat Patidar's RCB not a one-man show anymoreIPL 2025: With Rajat Patidar leading from the front, Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) have played as a unit, making a brilliant start to their campaign. On Monday, RCB stormed to their third win out of four matches in the ongoing tournament after beating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs.

In an emotional interview, the 27-year-old has explained the daily struggles he faces due to concussion injuries.

Devdutt Padikkal credits captain Rajat Patidar for RCB's brilliant startRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Devdutt Padikkal has credited captain Rajat Patidar for his side's impressive start in the ongoing IPL 2025 after the 12-run win over MI.

Watch: Apuia's last-gasp worldie take Mohun Bagan to ISL FinalLalengmawia 'Apuia' Ralte scored a world-class last-gasp goal helped Mohun Bagan qualify for the final of the Indian Super League on Monday, April 7. Apuia's goal left the Kolkata crowd stunned.

On Monday, RCB stormed to their third win out of four matches in the ongoing tournament after beating Mumbai Indians by 12 runs.

In an emotional interview, the 27-year-old has explained the daily struggles he faces due to concussion injuries.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
